description.brazilian: Obtenha 2.000 pontos de massacre com um único inimigo.
description.english: Get 2,000 Overkill points from a single enemy
description.french: Obtenir 2 000 points de destruction en chaîne sur un seul ennemi
description.german: Erhalte 2.000 Overkill-Punkte von einem einzigen Feind
description.italian: Ottieni 2.000 punti massacro da un unico nemico
description.japanese: 1体の敵から2,000オーバーキルポイントを獲得する
description.russian: Получите 2000 очков добивания от одного врага
description.schinese: 从一个敌人身上获得2000超伤点数
description.spanish: Obtén 2000 puntos de destrucción masiva de un solo enemigo.

description.brazilian: Alcance 100.000 pontos com um único combo.
description.english: Score 100,000 points from a single combo
description.french: Marquer 100 000 points sur un même combo
description.german: Erziele 100.000 Punkte aus einer einzigen Kombo
description.italian: Ottieni 100.000 punti da un'unica combo
description.japanese: 1回のコンボで100,000ポイントを獲得する
description.russian: Наберите 100 тыс. очков в одном комбо
description.schinese: 通过一次连击获得100,000点数
description.spanish: Consigue 100 000 puntos con un solo combo.

description.brazilian: Alcance 10.000.000 de pontos em uma única partida.
description.english: Score 10,000,000 points in a single game
description.french: Marquer 10 000 000 points en une partie
description.german: Erziele 10.000.000 Punkte in einem einzigen Spiel
description.italian: Ottieni 10.000.000 di punti in un'unica partita
description.japanese: 1回のプレイで10,000,000ポイントを獲得する
description.russian: Получите 10 млн очков за одну игру
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中得到10,000,000点数
description.spanish: Obtén 10 000 000 de puntos en una sola partida.

description.brazilian: Elimine 20 inimigos com um único combo.
description.english: Kill 20 enemies in a single combo
description.french: Éliminer 20 ennemis sur un seul combo
description.german: Töte 20 Feinde mit einer einzigen Kombo
description.italian: Elimina 20 nemici con un'unica combo
description.japanese: 1回のコンボで敵を20体倒す
description.schinese: 在一次连击中击杀20个敌人
description.spanish: Mata a 20 enemigos con un solo combo.

description.brazilian: Elimine 50 inimigos em um único combo.
description.english: Kill 50 enemies in a single combo
description.french: Éliminer 50 ennemis sur un même combo
description.german: Töte 50 Feinde mit einer einzigen Kombo
description.italian: Elimina 50 nemici con un'unica combo
description.japanese: 1回のコンボで敵を50体倒す
description.schinese: 在一次连击中击杀50个敌人
description.spanish: Mata a 50 enemigos en el mismo combo.

description.brazilian: Elimine 15 inimigos com um único projétil.
description.english: Kill 15 enemies with a single projectile
description.french: Éliminer 15 ennemis d'un seul projectile
description.german: Töte 15 Feinde mit einem einzigen Geschoss
description.italian: Elimina 15 nemici con un unico proiettile
description.japanese: 1発の弾で敵を15体倒す
description.schinese: 利用一颗射弹击杀15个敌人
description.spanish: Elimina a 15 enemigos con un único proyectil.

description.brazilian: Reflita um projétil de volta para quem o atirou.
description.english: Reflect a projectile back to its shooter
description.french: Renvoyer un projectile au tireur
description.german: Wirf ein Geschoss auf den Schützen zurück
description.italian: Rifletti un proiettile contro chi l'ha sparato
description.japanese: 弾を撃ってきた敵にその弾を跳ね返す
description.russian: Отразите снаряд тому, кто его выпустил
description.schinese: 将射弹反弹给发射者
description.spanish: Devuelve un proyectil a su lanzador.

description.brazilian: Destrua uma nave armada com os projéteis dela mesma.
description.english: Kill a Gunship with its own projectiles
description.french: Éliminer un hélico de combat avec ses propres projectiles
description.german: Vernichte ein Kampfschiff mit seinen eigenen Geschossen
description.italian: Elimina una cannoniera con il suo stesso proiettile
description.japanese: ガンシップを自弾で破壊に追いこむ
description.russian: Уничтожьте боевой корабль его же снарядами
description.schinese: 利用炮艇自身的射弹击杀一艘炮艇
description.spanish: Elimina un avión de combate con sus propios proyectiles.

description.brazilian: Elimine um inimigo grande somente com estilhaços de massacre.
description.english: Kill a large enemy exclusively with Overkill shrapnel
description.french: Éliminer un gros ennemi uniquement avec des éclats de destruction en chaîne
description.german: Töte einen großen Gegner ausschließlich mit Overkill-Granatsplittern
description.italian: Elimina un nemico grande con i detriti di un massacro
description.japanese: オーバーキル弾で大型の敵1体だけを撃破する
description.koreana: 과잉 처치로 인한 파편으로 대형 적 처치
description.russian: Уничтожьте крупного врага одним лишь эффектом от добивания
description.schinese: 仅使用超伤弹片击杀一个大型敌人
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo grande solo con la metralla de destrucción masiva.

description.brazilian: Faça um massacre em cadeia com 5 inimigos.
description.english: Chain Overkill through 5 enemies
description.french: Destruction en chaîne sur 5 ennemis
description.german: Ketten-Overkill durch 5 Feinde
description.italian: Massacra 5 nemici a catena
description.japanese: 5体の敵を連続オーバーキルする
description.schinese: 连锁超伤穿透5个敌人
description.spanish: Encadena destrucción masiva con 5 enemigos.

description.brazilian: Cause um tremor excessivo da tela.
description.english: Cause excessive screen shaking
description.french: Générer d'énormes vibrations de l'écran
description.german: Verursache übermäßiges Bildschirmwackeln
description.italian: Provoca un tremolio dello schermo eccessivo
description.japanese: 過剰な画面振動を発生させる
description.schinese: 引发过度的屏幕抖动
description.spanish: Provoca un temblor excesivo de la pantalla.

description.brazilian: Remova todos os braços de uma formação de estrela cadente.
description.english: Remove all branches from a shooting star formation
description.french: Supprimer toutes les branches d'une formation stellaire
description.german: Entferne alle Ausläufer einer Sternschnuppen-Formation
description.italian: Rimuovi tutti i bracci da una formazione a stella
description.japanese: 「流れ星」フォーメーションから全ての「枝」を取り除く
description.koreana: 슈팅 스타 대형의 튀어나온 부분 모두 제거
description.russian: Отсеките все ответвления формации падающей звезды
description.schinese: 消除流星队形的所有分支
description.spanish: Elimina todos los extremos de una formación de estrella.

description.brazilian: Descubra a arma secreta.
description.english: Discover the Secret Weapon
description.french: Découvrir l'arme secrète
description.german: Entdecke die Geheimwaffe
description.italian: Scopri l'arma segreta
description.japanese: 秘密兵器を発見する
description.schinese: 发现秘密武器
description.spanish: Descubre el arma secreta.

description.brazilian: Dispare 100 foguetes e/ou mísseis em uma única fase.
description.english: Launch 100 rockets and missiles in a single level
description.finnish: Laukaise 100 rakettia tai ohjusta yhdessä kentässä
description.french: Lancer 100 roquettes et missiles sur un même niveau
description.german: Feuere 100 Raketen und Lenkraketen in einem einzigen Level ab
description.italian: Spara 100 razzi e missili in un unico livello
description.japanese: 1つのステージで合計100発のロケットとミサイルを発射する
description.koreana: 한 스테이지에서 로켓과 미사일 총 100개 발사
description.russian: Запустите 100 ракет и снарядов за один уровень
description.schinese: 在一个关卡中发射100枚火箭和导弹
description.spanish: Lanza 100 cohetes o misiles en el mismo nivel.

description.brazilian: Comece uma fase equipado com 2 drones armados.
description.english: Start a level with 2 Gun Drones equipped
description.french: S'équiper de 2 drones de tir pour commencer un niveau
description.german: Beginne ein Level mit 2 ausgerüsteten Waffendrohnen
description.italian: Inizia un livello con 2 droni da fuoco equipaggiati
description.japanese: 2つのガンドローンを装備してステージを開始する
description.schinese: 装备两架火炮无人机开始关卡
description.spanish: Empieza un nivel con 2 drones armados equipados.

description.brazilian: Comece uma fase equipado com videiras agarradoras e drones serradores.
description.english: Start a level with both Grabber Vines and Saw Drones equipped
description.french: S'équiper de lianes préhensiles et de drones scies pour commencer un niveau
description.german: Beginne ein Level mit ausgerüsteten Schnappranken und Sägedrohnen
description.italian: Inizia un livello con le liane afferranti e i droni seganti equipaggiati
description.japanese: グラッバーヴァインとノコドローンを装備してステージを開始する
description.koreana: 덩굴손과 톱 드론을 모두 장착하고 스테이지 시작
description.russian: Начните уровень, экипировав и хватуны, и пилодроны одновременно
description.schinese: 同时装备抓钩藤曼和电锯无人机开始关卡
description.spanish: Empieza un nivel con las lianas de agarre y los drones sierra equipados.

description.brazilian: Agarre um inimigo hackeado.
description.english: Grab a Hacked enemy
description.french: Attraper un ennemi piraté
description.german: Schnapp dir einen gehackten Gegner
description.italian: Afferra un nemico manomesso
description.japanese: ハッキングした敵をつかむ
description.schinese: 抓住一个被侵入的敌人
description.spanish: Agarra a un enemigo pirateado.

description.brazilian: Experimente todos os equipamentos.
description.english: Try out every equipment
description.french: Tester tous les équipements
description.german: Probiere jedes Ausrüstungsteil aus
description.italian: Prova ogni equipaggiamento
description.japanese: 全ての装備をお試しする
description.schinese: 试遍各种装备
description.spanish: Prueba todas las piezas de equipo.

displayName.english: Like a FIGHTER JET made of BICEPS
displayName.french: Comme un CHASSEUR avec de GROS BICEPS
displayName.japanese: 上腕二頭筋に戦闘機乗せてんのかい！
displayName.schinese: 简直是战斗机里的二头肌
displayName.spanish: Un CAZA DE COMBATE hecho de puro MÚSCULO

description.brazilian: Vença na dificuldade Especialista.
description.english: Win on Expert difficulty
description.french: Gagner en Expert
description.german: Gewinne in der Schwierigkeit „Experte“
description.italian: Vinci a difficoltà Esperta
description.japanese: 難易度エキスパートをクリアする
description.schinese: 赢得专家难度
description.spanish: Gana en dificultad Extrema.

description.brazilian: Detenha o laser gigante do Cientista Louco.
description.english: Stop the Mad Scientist's giant laser
description.french: Arrêter le laser géant du Savant fou
description.german: Halte den riesigen Laser des Verrückten Wissenschaftlers auf
description.italian: Ferma il laser gigante dello scienziato pazzo
description.japanese: マッドサイエンティストの巨大レーザーを止める
description.schinese: 阻止疯狂科学家的巨型激光
description.spanish: Detén el láser gigante del científico loco.

description.brazilian: Derrote o Cientista Louco em 30 segundos.
description.english: Defeat the Mad Scientist in 30 seconds
description.french: Vaincre le Savant fou en 30 secondes
description.german: Besiege den Verrückten Wissenschaftler in 30 Sekunden
description.italian: Sconfiggi lo scienziato pazzo entro 30 secondi
description.japanese: マッドサイエンティストを30秒以内に撃破する
description.schinese: 在30秒内击败疯狂科学家
description.spanish: Derrota al científico loco en 30 segundos.

description.brazilian: Derrote a F.R.I.D.A. em 30 segundos.
description.english: Defeat A.S.D.I. in 30 seconds
description.french: Vaincre I.D.S.A en 30 secondes
description.german: Besiege K.I.W.I. in 30 Sekunden
description.italian: Sconfiggi I.S.S.A. entro 30 secondi
description.japanese: A.S.D.I.を30秒以内に撃破する
description.schinese: 在30秒内击败A.S.D.I.
description.spanish: Derrota a IADAC en 30 segundos.

displayName.japanese: いったい何が起きたのか…

description.brazilian: Descubra todos os finais.
description.english: Discover all endings
description.french: Découvrir toutes les fins
description.german: Entdecke alle Enden
description.italian: Scopri tutti i finali
description.japanese: 全てのエンディングを見る
description.schinese: 发现所有结局
description.spanish: Descubre todos los finales.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie a fase de bônus.
description.english: Unlock the bonus level
description.french: Débloquer le niveau bonus
description.german: Schalte das Bonuslevel frei
description.italian: Sblocca il livello bonus
description.japanese: ボーナスステージを解放する
description.schinese: 解锁奖励关卡
description.spanish: Desbloquea el nivel adicional.

description.brazilian: Elimine todos os inimigos na fase de bônus.
description.english: Clear all enemies in the bonus level
description.french: Éliminer tous les ennemis du niveau bonus
description.german: Beseitige alle Feinde im Bonuslevel
description.italian: Elimina tutti i nemici nel livello bonus
description.japanese: ボーナスステージで全ての敵を撃破する
description.russian: Уничтожьте всех врагов на бонусном уровне
description.schinese: 清除奖励关卡中的所有敌人
description.spanish: Elimina a todos los enemigos del nivel adicional.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie e limpe totalmente todas as fases de bônus em uma única jornada.
description.english: Unlock and fully clear all bonus levels in a single run
description.finnish: Avaa ja tyhjää kaikki lisäkentät yhdellä pelikerralla
description.french: Débloquer et nettoyer tous les niveaux bonus en une sortie
description.german: Schalte in einem einzigen Run alle Bonuslevels frei und schließe sie ab
description.italian: Sblocca e completa tutti i livelli bonus in un'unica partita
description.japanese: 1回のプレイで全ボーナスステージを解放＆完全クリアする
description.koreana: 게임 한 판에 모든 보너스 스테이지를 잠금 해제하고 완전히 클리어
description.russian: Откройте и полностью зачистите все бонусные уровни за один забег
description.schinese: 在一轮游戏中解锁所有奖励关卡并彻底清理
description.spanish: Desbloquea y supera todos los niveles adicionales en la misma partida.
